thread.title: Will House Republicans line up behind Paul Ryan? PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Will House Republicans line up behind Paul Ryan? | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Will House Republicans line up behind Paul Ryan? PBS NewsHour
text: Wisconsin Rep. Paul Ryan says he’s willing to step up as Speaker of the House, but only if divided groups of conservatives back him first. Political director Lisa Desjardins joins Judy Woodruff from Capitol Hill to discuss how members of the House GOP are reacting to Ryan’s requests.
